message:
Hello @everybody! I'm Carmo and I'm 11 years old!
I'm selling lemonade in front of our house just off the praça, come buy some please! 💖
Hi @🧒🏽, That's so cute! I'll come take a look right now!
That hit the spot, highly recommended!
Thank you for your business, @🦜!

Hmm, I could use a refreshing drink too. ☀️ 👍
I'll be there in a bit.
Me too!
I’ve still got plenty! ...uh, kind of.

Yeah, I'm all out. 🤦
Hang on everybody, I have to go grab some more from the store. Back in a bit!
There we go, lemons back in stock. Thanks, @🏪!

Happy to help a fellow businesswoman! 😹

We have plenty of other things in stock if your business takes off and you have more money to spend.
Ooh, like what? 😲
Well, we have some very nice glitter glue pens so you can make a fancy sign for your lemonade business. ✨
And a nice, cheap solar charger for your phone so you don’t need to run inside when the battery gets low.
🤔 And I guess we also have an ice machine in stock if you’re running out of that a lot, that one’s kind of expensive though.

I already have a solar charger! Mom gave me one for my birthday, it’s so neat!
Those other two sound very useful though.
For my business.

Thank you for stopping by and showing me the sign you drew with the glitter pens, @🧒🏽.
It was very impressive!
I bet people will come buy lemonade twice as fast now! ✨✨
I wouldn’t be surprised, yeah. 🙂

That new ice machine is so fast! I really like it! ⛄
Do you have another one?

Just how much lemonade do you think you’re going to sell?! 🤣
I’ll have to order in a new one, they take up quite a bit of space and don’t usually sell all that quickly. I’ll let you know when it comes in.
Just what I needed after a day in the sun, thank you @🧒🏽!
You’re welcome, @🏖️!

I just can't get enough of this lemonade, it's delicious.
🍹✨
Thank you! ✨
Thanks for letting me fill up my thermos with lemonade, that should keep me going on my tour of the island today.
This really is excellent lemonade. 💛
I could do with another round as well…
...I accidentally drank it all before lunch, I’ll come by for a refill in a bit!
More lemonade! Give me more!

Are you doing okay there, @🐶?
It is good though, I’ll admit I could go for some more as well.

If you're interested, @🧒🏽, I can also sell you some lemon tree saplings so you could grow your own lemons.

They should do okay in your backyard if you water them regularly.

Oooh, that sounds like fun!
Wouldn't that take a long time though?

Hah! I guess it would, at least 5-6 years.
There are no magic shortcuts when it comes to stuff like this.
That's not entirely true...
What do you mean, @👁️‍🗨️? 😲
Easiest just to show you, I'll be right over...

@🏪, I'm coming to buy one of your saplings!
I have a magic potion that will make them grow super fast.

I don't know what @👁️‍🗨️ told you, but I don't think that's a real thing. 😕
I'll gladly sell you a sapling if you want one though. Just don't expect too much.
Hmmm, I’m going to try it! ✨

It’s working! 🙌
Now this is more like it, it’s already larger than I am!!
...wait, really? What did you sell her, @👁️‍🗨️?
@🏪 It was a gift! I didn’t need to pay anything.
I just wan ted to hel p.

This is going to help me a bunch, thank you @👁️‍🗨️!
And @🏪, I’m going to buy so many of your saplings! This is fun!
@👁️‍🗨️ Huh, that bottle of potion you gave me is starting to look pretty empty… do you have more?
S ure! I will gladly sel l you more potion.
Yay! How much does it cost? I have money_amount saved up.

No need for any of that. W I want to trade.
You bring me lemons, I give you more potion.
That works even better, the first trees are already growing lemons! ✨
@everybody I’m not sure what is going on today, but I’m going to have to limit the amount of lemons people are allowed to buy to 1 bag per customer.
That’s so unfair!

@🦜 if I wouldn’t, I’d be out in the next hour.
People have really been going crazy today…
I’m sorry, @🏪! I know I bought, like, a whole bunch of them.

You’re fine, @🧒🏽. Don’t worry. 😊
Some other people just are going crazy for them today.

We need more lemons!
You can’t cut us off like this.

Wah, cut you off? You’re worrying me, @🐶.
Also, I can’t stop you from chomping down on lemons as soon as you’ve paid for them, but, uh…
(Yes, I saw you.)
@👁️‍🗨️ So… when you said you had more magic, did you just mean more potion?
No t at all, we have m uch magic. We can strengthen the magical potion for you and also pro vide you with other magic.
Make the potion stronger? 😲 Stronger how?
Every way. F aster growth, more lemon ade produced, tastier lemon ade.
I want that! Can I just bring you more lemons for that?
Yes p lease. I n eed more lemons.
Alright! I’ll start saving them up. ✨
...when you say other magic, what kind of magic do you have?
A ll s orts. What w ould you like?
All sorts? Like, even magical animals?!
We can m ake those, de finitely.
What k ind of animal do you want? It w ould take many lemons.
A unicorn, obviously!! 🎉
What is a uni corn?

You don’t know what a unicorn is? 😲
They’re the best!
One of these? https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Unicorn
Yeah! But, like, even more magic!
Ex plain?

Can you make it so it can understand what I say? And is super big and strong? And give it the softest hair!
And so it can make cupcakes from its horn!! With different frostings every time!
I- yes? Yes. This will take a lot of e ffort to accom plish but it is not impossible.
So you’d need, like, a million lemons or something?
Is that a lot?
Yeah, that’s like one of the biggest numbers there is.
Then yes. A mill ion lemons.
That’s going to take a while to gather…
We will get started on researching how to make this unicorn while you d o.
Th ank you for your p urchase? We are still wor king on the unicorn. The hooves are done.
This is di fferent to anything we have ev er done. It… inter ests us.
That one sh ould help you a lot to make more lemons.
Which is go od because the unicorn is almost done. The cupcake pro duction was es pecially trick y.

🤔 What to name you… Anastasia? Fernando?
I can’t tell if you’re a boy unicorn or a girl unicorn…
I should have asked for you to be able to talk!
...where is everybody anyway?

@🧒🏽, please tell me you’re safe!
My flight just got rerouted to São Filipe. Something about a mass riot on the island?
Stay inside, lock the doors, write me back, please.

Not part of the narrative, developer notice You made it to the end of chapter 1! Thank you so much for playing this in-progress version of my game, I truly appreciate it. I’d love to hear your thoughts on it, so feel free (and encouraged!) to reach out to me. I’m pretty pleased with the current state of the chapter, but am also sure it could be better.
